SourceProxy.name: OGSVariableAggregator
SourceProxy.label: OGS Variable Aggregator

Documentation.long_help: This plugin enables to compute aggregated variables.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This plugin enables the user to compute aggregated variables. Some aggregated variables are already predefined. The user can input new aggregated variables by setting an XML file as input or using a text box and writing the aggregation in XML syntax.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.label: XML File
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property points to the XML file that defines the aggregated variables.

StringVectorProperty.name: VarStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Aggregated Variables
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of all the aggregated variables.

IntVectorProperty.name: deleteVars
IntVectorProperty.label: Delete Aggregated Variables
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 0, the aggregated variables will not be deleted.

StringVectorProperty.name: aggrVars
StringVectorProperty.label: Aggregated Variables
StringVectorProperty.Documentation:
" Instead of giving an XML file to load, the aggregated variables can be instead written in this text box using XML syntax.
Just the aggregate node and the subseguent aggrVar and var are needed.
